caption.p: Ratios between theoretical and measured 50% inhibitory concentration (IC 50_T/M) of the investigated 127 essential oils (EOs) blends. The datapoints lying on the dashed line (IC 50_T/M = 1) reflect an additive antibacterial activity of EOs against Aeromonas veronii bv. sobria, while the datapoints above and below the dashed line represent synergistic and antagonistic interactions of EOs, respectively.
